urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text:
@csjbernales Hi, Clark. Travel guide varies per destination. You may check the travel rules and requirements here: https://t.co/eTai7nz0LJ

We also suggest checking the official website of the LGU of your destination for the update travel guidelines.
@shantanalv Hi, Diane. We have sent you a DM for further assistance on this. Thank you!
@a_d_j_a_n_i You're welcome, Adjani!

urls.title: ‎Philippine Airlines
urls.description: ‎Mabuhay! Welcome to the Philippine Airlines’ mobile app. Pursue your dreams of travel with enhanced ease, speed, and convenience. Now it is easier to bridge the distance between your friends and loved ones with a few simple steps. We designed this app with you in our heart, because we know how you…

data.text:
@a_d_j_a_n_i Hi, Adjani! We're sorry about that. We suggest to use our new app instead:

https://t.co/94I5gkvpHE

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text:
@LyraElla1130 Hi, Lyra. Apologies for the delayed response. The requirement is based per passenger type as well as the vaccination status. For your guide, you may refer here:

https://t.co/eTai7nz0LJ
@LyraElla1130 As of the moment, if you have not received a booster shot, you will need to undergo a pre-departure COVID-19 test, Lyra. Kindly standby for further updates.
@CanIBizzOnU You're welcome, Brendan.

@CanIBizzOnU Hi Brendan. Unfortunately, as a precautionary measure due to the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict, we will take an alternative route that will need a technical stopover in Vancouver. The short technical stopover is required for refueling and to avoid payload limitations.
@Trueorfalsedata May we confirm if you are a travel agent?
@imJnyONE Hi, Jenny. We sent you a DM to further assist you. Kindly check. Thank you.
@ancas_paje Hi, Anca. We sent you a DM to further assist you. Kindly check. Thank you.
@CarminaShinoda We have this noted. Certain information might be needed in order for the handling team to proceed with your request, Carmina. We hope for your understanding.

@joeymanuguid Hi, Joe! This would depend on the flight route and the date. For your guide, you may try clicking the "CLASS" tab and click PREMIUM ECONOMY, in order for you to filter out the specific fare class on the flight you wish to book :)
@ShayannGaile Hi. Shayann. We have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@mikeehidalgo We regret to learn of your disappointments, Mikee. May we suggest to restart the mobile app or book through our website https://t.co/kFPhsARO8t. instead.

@ricpac Hi, @ricpac. Our apologies as we are currently working on our Travel Requirements page. We highly suggest to coordinate with your destination's government unit for the most updated travel information. Thank you.

@drdeguzman Hi, Dennis. We do not have an advisory regarding this as of the moment. You may visit our social media pages and website so that you will be updated the moment we release advisories on new developments. 

Thank you.
@Trueorfalsedata Hi, Hitesh. May you provide more details on your concern?
@jaki_xxiii Tickets have validity, Jaki. If it is already not valid, we are sorry but we can no longer modify it. Thank you.
@jaki_xxiii Hi Jaki. Please allow us to explain that if the ticket is no longer valid, we regret we can no longer act on it. We are sorry about this.
@CarminaShinoda We regret to learn of your disappointment. Please allow us to explain that if you are requesting for refund without penalties, we need supporting documents for our assessment.
@ylcostepsis Hi, 6uchi. We've sent you a dm.

@Yas_2026 As of this writing, the said passenger must present a negative RT-PCR test taken within 48 hours or negative Antigen test taken within 24 hours prior to departure from the country of origin upon check-in. (Not applicable to children below 3 years old. )
@AgnesLianesa Hi, Lianesa. We have sent you a dm so we can ask for your details. Kindly check.
@Kinikole Hi, Nikowle. We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please allow us to look into this. We have sent you a DM to further assist you. Kindly check. Thank you.
@Noellie0412 Hi, Noellie. We are sorry to hear this. We have replied to your DM and have requested assistance from the handling office. We will message you back for updates. Thank you.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @Yas_2026 Hi, Y.A. Partially vaccinated Filipino nationals including those who hold dual citizenship are allowed to enter the Philippines. However, they will need to undergo facility-based quarantine and must present a negative COVID-19 test result.
@PerretiLeboy We're sorry to hear this, Baglover. We have tried sending you a dm but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check.

@TrueBlueLQ215 We're truly sorry for the inconvenience, Quo. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. We have tried sending you a dm to ask for your details but we are unable to do so. Kindly check your settings.
@kethirisundara1 Hi, Kethiri. We have sent you a DM so we can assist you further. Thank you.
@akosipaprika You're welcome!
@xtanm This is noted, chrisTan. We sent you a message. Kindly check your inbox.
@hettyspahetty Hi, jj. You may bring a maximum of 2liters of rubbing alcohol in your check-in baggage. Each container must not exceed 500ml. Please ensure it is properly packed and sealed. Thank you.
@troubledsoul_19 We sent you a message. Kindly check your inbox.
@ChukFarley We are sorry to hear this, Chuk.  May we clarify if were also previously in correspondence with our Baggage Team regarding this?
@xtanm We are sorry to hear this, @xtanm. May we know if you booked directly with PAL?
@Gic_himself We are pleased to be of service, @Gic_himself. We sent you a direct message. We hope you can check. Thank you.

@akosipaprika For domestic flights, you may bring more than one bag, as long as the total weight of all your baggage will not exceed your allowance, DGlurker.

Thank you.

@johnnytamad Rest assured that your messages will be brought to the attention of the office concerned for their information and service enhancement. 

(2/2)

@johnnytamad Reading your feedback truly saddens us but we highly appreciate your time and effort on bringing this matter to our attention, Johnny. Please allow us to extend a sincere apology if our service did not meet your expectation. 

(1/n)
@akosipaprika Hi, DGlurker. This will depend on your flight route. May we know it?
@johnnytamad We're sorry to hear your disappointment, Johnny. We've tried sending you a dm to ask for your details. However, we are unable to do so. Kindly check your settings.

data.text: @ChukFarley Our apologies but we can only reiterate our previous advice to directly coordinate with Qatar airways for updates on your baggage, Chuk.

data.text: @bobbyjonc @PALMabuhayMiles Hi, Bob. PAL reported this cybersecurity incident to the Philippine National Privacy Commission on 8 September 2022. Accelya has assured us that necessary actions were immediately undertaken in order to contain the incident.

@kethirisundara1 Hi, Kethiri. We're sorry to hear about your brother's baggage. We'd like to assist you in checking this with our handling team. However, we're unable to send you a DM :( This is in order for us to ask for your brother's booking details. Kindly make sure the feature is enabled.

@tienne_bangtan @PALMabuhayMiles If you have any further queries about this incident with Accelya and need further assistance on the matter, please feel free to contact us at DPComms@philippineairlines.com.

data.text:
@tienne_bangtan @PALMabuhayMiles Hi, Tienne. This is a legit email. The link provided is for our Mabuhay Miles members, in order for them to change their password for added security. 

We do recommend that you change passwords regularly, and the use of a strong password is best practice.
@melanieherself We're sorry to know about this, Melanie. Kindly approach our airport personnel for immediate assistance. Thank you.
